name: StarMoney User Database File
summary: Learn about .SDY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Star Finanz is a German-based company. It develops several variations of StarMoney, which include personal and business versions, to manage multiple financial accounts. The software creates SDY and SDX files to store all of the data entered by the user.
The SDY and SDX database files for the Windows desktop version of StarMoney are located in the following directory (beginning with StarMoney 7.0):

description: An SDY file is a database file created by the Windows version of Star Finanz StarMoney, an online banking application. It contains data entered by a user, such as banking account information and transactions. SDY files are accompanied by .SDX database files, which make up the other part of the database.

instructions: SDY files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the Windows version of Star Finanz StarMoney references the files to load the information stored in the files.
